name: The Onion Knights
detailed_description:
A Defense Game with Shooting Element. It’s Absorbing and Fun

◦ Simple up and down control allows you to overwhelm the enemy and defend the castle.
◦ Funny characters with comic, but great action skills.
◦ Requires deep strategy. You will never be bored with all kinds of extraordinary item.

Numerous Stages Mode

10 battle field and 200 stages with Normal and Elite mode.
Protect the castle from cruel enemy and get the highest score.
Hire all kind of mercenaries and upgrade the knights’ skill.

Experience Every Combination [Skill System]

◦ 3 knights has different skills!
Each knight has 5 unique skills as leveling up.
◦ Set your own strategy with each knight’s special skill.
◦ Upgrade each skill to max 10 level. Additional effect will be applied during the upgrade.
◦ Customize skill set to your own style.
Try every set until you feels just right.

A Game Play Beyond Your Imagination [Mercenary System]

◦ Hire enemy mercenary as an ally.
Enemy with powerful skill is now your friend. You and he both know the drill and it’s time to fight.
◦ Magic Stone summons and upgrades the mercenary.
Upgraded mercenary is more powerful and has additional ability with great attack value.
◦ Each mercenary has their unique skill as well as their looks.
No more repetitive attack pattern or grinding.

Customize Your Own Knighthood [Upgrade System]

◦ Upgrade Cannon, the main weapon, and MP Storage. Nurture your own sets of Onion Knights through the battles.
◦ Everlasting game play
Variety of skill and mercenary combination will make the game always fresh.

short_description:
Experience exciting adventure with Onion Knights!

5 knights empowers themselves with magical onion juice.
Defend the kingdom from an endless swarms of enemy.

This shooting defense game offers unique heroes with fantastic and comic skills.

You are appointed the new head of the knighthood!
Defend the realm with your own strategy!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Thai, Turkish, Portuguese, Portuguese-Brazil, Polish, Korean, Hungarian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: dual core 2.0GHz CPU or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 video card with shader 2 support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows7, Windows8, Windows10
  • Processor: quad core 2.4GHz CPU or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 video card with shader 3 support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
